article.headline: McNeese State 61, Mississippi Valley State 44
article.story: LAKE CHARLES, La. (AP) -- Jarvis Bradley scored 19 points and three other McNeese State players joined him in double figures as the Cowboys posted a convincing 61-44 win over Mississippi Valley State on Saturday. The Delta Devils (1-6) held a 23-21 first half lead but McNeese State outscored them 40-21 in the second half. It was a game of two, 10-minute periods in the first half. The Cowboys went on a 14-0 run to take a 15-1 lead midway but MVSU came back with a 22-6 run to take the lead at intermission. In the second half, McNeese went on a 19-2 run after the score had been tied 27-27 to seal the win. John Ford scored 12 points for McNeese (3-5), while John Pichon had 11 and Aldryan Wardell added 10. Pichon also grabbed nine rebounds and blocked three shots. Carl Lucas led the way for MVSU with seven points.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
